plot outline: The movie revolves around four friends among whom one faces a very funny situation, which puts the other three into a big soup. This happens a day before the man's marriage and how the other three takes it forward makes up the rest of the film. The film is expected to be released 9 May 2014.
title: Medulla Oblongata
plot: _Medulla Oblongata_ (qv) is a Malayalam movie produced by S. Madhan and directed by Suresh Nair. It is a remake of Tamil film Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom. The remake stars Rahul Madhav and newcomer Avaana.

The movie revolves around four friends among whom one faces a very funny situation, which puts the other three into a big soup. This happens a day before the man's marriage and how the other three takes it forward makes up the rest of the film. The film is expected to be released 9 May 2014.
